SEARCH
Package crud

Class CustomerCrud

java.lang.Object
crud.Crud
crud.CustomerCrud
public class CustomerCrud extends Crud
The CustomerCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Customer Table

      public boolean insertCustomer(Customer cust) throws SQLException, Exception
      Inserts a Customer into the Customer table
      Parameters:
      cust - A customer Object containing all details (fName, lName, email, address, passWord, phone) to be entered into the Customer table, where the password is hashed before insertion
      Returns:
      True/False
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error for insertion of a Customer
      Exception

    • login

      public boolean login(String email, String passWord) throws SQLException, Exception
      Verifies the credentials of a customer by checking the entered email and password against the existing customers in the Customer table
      Parameters:
      email - and passWord Retrieves a customer based on the email and password provided.
      passWord - the users password
      Returns:
      true if a customer with the provided password and email exists, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a Customer not be found in the table
      Exception

      Method which finds a customer based on their mail address and returns their hashed password from
      Parameters:
      email - The customers email
      Returns:
      The customers hashed password stored in the db
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if error with query

    • getCustomerByEmail

      public Customer getCustomerByEmail(String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a Customer from the Customer table by email and password
      Parameters:
      email - The email to search for in the Customer table
      password - The customers password
      Returns:
      The currently logged in Customer object
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should a Customer not be found in the table
